aws.ec2 module¶

aws.ec2.get_instances[source]¶

Get all EC2 instances or select them by ID.

Parameters

*instance_ids (str) – IDs of EC2 instances to get.

Returns

List of EC2 instances.

Return type

list[dict]

aws.ec2.get_num_instances()[source]¶

Get the number of available EC2 instances.

Returns

Number of available EC2 instances.

Return type

int

aws.ec2.get_running_ips()[source]¶

Get the IPs corresponding to running EC2 instances.

Returns

List of IPs.

Return type

list[str]

aws.ec2.get_state(state)[source]¶

Get all EC2 instances of a certain state.

Parameters

state (str) – State to filter for.

Returns

List of EC2 instances in state state.

Return type

list[dict]

aws.ec2.check_all_running()[source]¶

Check whether all EC2 instances are running.

Returns

True if all EC2 instances are running, else False.

Return type

bool

aws.ec2.run(image_id, instance_type, count, key_name, security_group)[source]¶

Run new EC2 instances.

Parameters

  • image_id (str) – Image ID.

  • instance_type (str) – Type of the instance.

  • count (int) – Number of such instances to run.

  • key_name (str) – Name of the key pair.

  • security_group (str) – Security group.

aws.ec2.terminate_all()[source]¶

Terminate all EC2 instances

aws.ec2.start_stopped()[source]¶

Start all stopped EC2 instances.

aws.ec2.stop_running()[source]¶

Stop all running EC2 instances.
